string.text: I need answers to some questions.
Ask away, I'll try to answer.
Where is my stuff?
All the confiscated stuff usually goes to the leader. His room is on the upper floor. Your stuff is most likely there.
Thank you!
How does one get out of here?

While I fought, I noticed a manhole under the stairs on the first floor. If the camera failed to open lattice, then this move would be to hit the road from here. A is better to go to the West, where the tunnel you can get to freedom.
Thanks for the info.
Who did we capture?

We got a mercenary. Who he is is not known to anyone around here, but there are rumors that he is cooperating with foreign intelligence services. The location of his base is the big secret... no one knows how to get into a Dead City. This is a secret many people are interested in, and especially 'Freedom' and 'Duty'.
Go on!
If we could get a map to Dead City, then we could attack them. They are either mercenaries or a bandits. You could try to find them.
Thanks for the information.
What do you know about this place?

The city is divided into two parts. Form where we are the territory of mercenaries is south of the territory of the bandits. Their base is in the school building in the southwest part of town. Between the bases there is the ruins of a five-story building. Next to that a five-story building, relatively in good shape. So you could stay there. It's around the garage and a couple of small homestead cabins. About half the bandits, a couple of dozen or so, are in a five-story building with garages. On the other side of the square is the building of the former City Council.
Thanks for the info.
Who leads them?
A most pleasant guy named Dushmanov. I noticed a couple of times he held a folder with documents. I think they could be quite interesting.
Thanks for the info.
Nope, nothing.
Strelok! Where have you been?! You were not with the guys in the latest attacks! I really started to worry.
Well I think my head is back to normal?
Strelok?
Well, you're Strelok, but who is it? Doctor. I, you do not know me? Hey, buddy, what's wrong with you, you're not yourself. We are with you in the Zone 2 years go. Do not you remember?
I do not remember.
Do not you remember? Strelok what are you doing? You're not kidding, an old friend, no? Hmm ... and guys, our guys do you remember? Fanatic, Ghost?
Fang can not remember, but Ghost is dead, his body I found in Yantar.
Ghost!? Dead?! Damn, how could this happen? Yes, they are also ... but they also have some of the best. Damn, what's wrong with you there then?
I do not know what happened, I do not remember.

Wait, let me at least a come after the news. I have only one thought - it all has to do with your last outing to the Zone center. When we met last time you left me the key from the cache on the Pripyat and the scheme, how to find it. I was able to save them, mercenaries have found. That hold, just hide well. Perhaps there is something you find. And you always said that with the Monolith a catch. But I understand you and he did not understand what I mean.
Chance of Rain. And where are we? I do not remember how I got here.
We are in Dead City! In the camp of mercenaries.
We are in Dead City! ... In the camp of mercenaries ...
By the way, I have information about the mercenaries. Are you interested?
It depends on what kind of information.
There is a map showing the location of the base. As well as finding the place and a lot of other useful information.
I agree that this information is of value, amounting to three thousand rubles.
Good enough. Here you go.
Excellent. And here is your reward. Stalkers soon will long argue whether there was a group of mercenaries as a legend or is it the next Zone.
No, it's too little.
Well as you like, but more I still cannot give.
There are documents about the mercenaries. I took them from the sniper.
This information is valuable in the amount of 3,000 rubles.
It's a deal. Here!
Excellent, and here is your reward.
No, it's too little.
Well, as you like, but I cannot give more.
No, sorry, they are nothing worthwhile. Just common gossip.
If you have something specific, I'll pay.
There PDA leader of mercenaries.
PDA is of value, amounting to 2,000 rubles.
It's a deal. Here.
Excellent. And here is your reward.
No, it's not enough.
So be it, but I can't give any more.
Hello, stalker! For you I have bad news. This is our territory and you will go with us.
Well, all right. Lead away.
You are still not mature enough nor tough enough to threaten me.
Ah it's you, Shooter! Cool. Long time since I have seen you.
Hey!
What this time?
Take this, it seems to be your PDA.
Yes, thanks. Hand it over.
